description:
### 11.21 bwdif_cuda

Deinterlace the input video using the bwdif algorithm, but implemented in CUDA
so that it can work as part of a GPU accelerated pipeline with nvdec and/or
nvenc.

It accepts the following parameters:

**mode**

    The interlacing mode to adopt. It accepts one of the following values: 0, send_frame Output one frame for each frame. 1, send_field Output one frame for each field. The default value is send_field. 

**parity**

    The picture field parity assumed for the input interlaced video. It accepts one of the following values: 0, tff Assume the top field is first. 1, bff Assume the bottom field is first. -1, auto Enable automatic detection of field parity. The default value is auto. If the interlacing is unknown or the decoder does not export this information, top field first will be assumed. 

**deint**

    Specify which frames to deinterlace. Accepts one of the following values: 0, all Deinterlace all frames. 1, interlaced Only deinterlace frames marked as interlaced. The default value is all.
name: bwdif_cuda

choices.help: send one frame for each frame
choices.name: send_frame

choices.help: send one frame for each field
choices.name: send_field

choices.help: send one frame for each frame, but skip spatial interlacing check
choices.name: send_frame_nospatial

choices.help: send one frame for each field, but skip spatial interlacing check
choices.name: send_field_nospatial

options.description:
The interlacing mode to adopt. It accepts one of the following values:

0, send_frame

Output one frame for each frame.

1, send_field

Output one frame for each field.

The default value is send_field.
options.name: mode

options.description:
The picture field parity assumed for the input interlaced video. It accepts one of the following values:

0, tff

Assume the top field is first.

1, bff

Assume the bottom field is first.

-1, auto

Enable automatic detection of field parity.

The default value is auto. If the interlacing is unknown or the decoder does not export this information, top field first will be assumed.
options.name: parity

choices.help: only deinterlace frames marked as interlaced
choices.name: interlaced

options.description:
Specify which frames to deinterlace. Accepts one of the following values:

0, all

Deinterlace all frames.

1, interlaced

Only deinterlace frames marked as interlaced.

The default value is all.
options.name: deint
